TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMemberCreationService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines methods to dynamically create, update and remove code elements for a type at design time. Methods are also provided that allow you to display code at design time.
